Here is the list of signs with their scores and descriptions:
1. Aries - 7/10 - Natural, passionate, impulsive, but also reckless and prone to emotional outbursts.
2. Taurus - 8.5/10 - Reliable, practical, sensuous, but can be stubborn and overly attached to material possessions.
3. Gemini - 9/10 - Curious, adaptable, communicative, but also restless and prone to distractions.
4. Cancer - 7.5/10 - Nurturing, protective, emotional, but also moody and clingy.
5. Leo - 8/10 - Confident, passionate, generous, but also prideful and domineering.
6. Virgo - 9/10 - Analytical, practical, hardworking, but also perfectionistic and critical.
7. Libra - 8.5/10 - Diplomatic, social, balanced, but also indecisive and overly concerned with appearances.
8. Scorpio - 8/10 - Passionate, intense, private, but also vengeful and possessive.
9. Sagittarius - 8.5/10 - Adventurous, optimistic, freedom-loving, but also reckless and tactless.
10. Capricorn - 7.5/10 - Disciplined, responsible, ambitious, but also rigid and overly critical.
11. Aquarius - 9/10 - Humanitarian, independent, unconventional, but also detached and rebellious.
12. Pisces - 8.5/10 - Compassionate, imaginative, empathetic, but also dreamy and easily distracted.
Note: The scores are subjective and based on general astrological interpretations.
